website_summaries.verdict: Once you figure out how to put the pieces together, this shoe cabinet will look great in any contemporary room and provide ample space for shoes and a few extras.
pros: In addition to 10 shelves, this cabinet has a drawer that's great for storing small accessories
Shelves are removable for fitting tall boots
Handsome design works well with other furniture pieces
cons: Some cabinets come without written instructions

customer_reviews.title: Very good for price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes organizer, fits size 8 on men shoes perfectly, it was not to hard to assemble, yes there are many pieces but instructions are easy to understand... I love it... It arrived a couple day later than expected but not too bad
customer_reviews.author: Goguis

customer_reviews.title: I love this cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I love this cabinet. I searched for a while for the exact size I needed for my hallway and the depth for it to be a tv stand as well. The cabinet came without any damage and there were instructions included. I’m used to having Ikea furniture so it wasn’t hard to put together. I have had it now for about 3 month and it’s holding up just fine. No complaint so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: When I received it, it was very heavy and not sure i could made or not. there was a manual papers which was very well written and easy to understand. It looks great and high quality cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Shin

customer_reviews.title: ... the pieces came damages or bent which made it horribly difficult to put together and the doors don’t close
customer_reviews.text: Some of the pieces came damages or bent which made it horribly difficult to put together and the doors don’t close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made and doors will not close properly.
customer_reviews.text: Put this cabinet together last night I was very disappointed with this cabinet, the cabinet doors and the drawers would not close properly and when we did try to close it, it ruin the finish of the cabinet. You have to open the drawer and door together in order to close properly. Since we threw away the box not sure how we can return it.
customer_reviews.author: The Big Kahuna

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Once you get past the hard to assemble frame, the rest is pretty easy. The wood (except for the thin bottom baseboard) is pretty sturdy. It holds more than what I expected and looks pretty good once completed. It does require two people to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: DAVE

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I bought 2 of these the look ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I bought 2 of these the look good and are strong and look like the will last a while
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional - Assembly is not easy
customer_reviews.text: Once you get this together its functional - Getting it together is not a snap in any way.
customer_reviews.author: TRi-RUNT

customer_reviews.title: Awful. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Doors fell off, screws stripped during assembly, everything's crooked. Returning this piece of garbage right away.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Miller

customer_reviews.title: Package is heavy, slight damage in chipping
customer_reviews.text: Looks Good, but the press wood is heavy and was slightly damaged in shipping
customer_reviews.author: Mark William Kadow

customer_reviews.title: The very bad stuff I ever bought from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality! It is hard to believe it is a $300 more product! The door already fell off twice less in two weeks since We installed.
customer_reviews.author: Hongxiu Ning

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Had my dad put it together for me because there were so many pieces to put together. The final built product looks exactly like the pictures. Holds all my shoes so I'm super happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: I received this cabinet promptly without any damage. However ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this cabinet promptly without any damage. However no matter how hard we searched, we could not find the installation instruction. Without the instruction, it is almost impossible to assemble so many pieces. Please help!
customer_reviews.author: SunFlower

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to assemble, and looks exactly like shown in all the images. But make sure you read all the instructions carefully before starting and count all the screws to make sure you match up the numbers correctly.
customer_reviews.author: denniskillz

customer_reviews.title: Nice-Looking Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Followed the enclosed diagrams closely and was able to assemble the cabinet in a few hours without too much difficulty. Encountered a few minor issues - adjusting the door hinges for proper alignment took a bit of time and the material used for the rear of the cabinet is rather flimsy. The final product is attractive and is sturdy and spacious enough to hold more than a few dozen shoes.
customer_reviews.author: FL, Boston

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not so good.
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy it was build this. However, at the end when we were testing the doors, they don’t close properly. They require you to open all doors and close it all at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Sharmi

product_meta.title: ioHOMES Darrion Modern 10-Shelf Shoe Cabinet with Center Drawer, Espresso
product_meta.description: Keep your shoes and accessories neatly tucked away within this spacious shoe cabinet. The sleek Espresso finish enhances the linear structure while three cabinet doors house ten shelves. A center drawer offers ample room for placing shoe Accessories such as extraneous shoelaces, socks and more. Product frame is made of medium fiber board. To clean, use damp cotton cloth to wipe clean. Assembly required. Product made in Taiwan. Once assembled, product measures 47. 24 inch wide by 13. 78 inch deep by 41. 34 inch high; 30-days hassle-free replacement parts. Drawer measures 12. 6 inch wide by 11. 8 inch deep by 4. 2 inch high; top left shelf measures 15. 9 inch wide by 7. 2 inch high; other left shelves measure 30 inch wide by 7 inch high; right hand shelves measure 15. 3 inch wide by 7 inch high. Pictures are for illustration purposes. All décor items are not included in this offer.
feature_bullets: Shoe cabinet features multiple enclosed shelves and a compact center drawer
Left-hand features two doors hiding one compact shelf and four lengthy shelves; right-hand cabinet reveals five additional shelves within
Stow up to thirty pairs of standard size shoes within the three cabinets; Espresso Finish blends with any modern home
Center drawer holds small accessories and opens easily with metal Glides; fits any entryway, Bedroom or closet
Measures 47. 24 inches wide by 13. 78 inches deep by 41. 34 inches high; 30-days hassle-free replacement parts

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars30 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
